text: In the UI Toolkit, what is the UQueryBuilder used for?

options.text: It is used to construct complex UI animations
It is used to query the UI hierarchy and find elements
It is used to bind UI elements to data sources
It is used to manage multi-threading in the UI

feedbackCorrect: The UQueryBuilder is used to query the UI hierarchy and find elements. It allows for complex queries to be constructed to find specific elements.
feedbackIncorrect: The UQueryBuilder is not used for constructing UI animations, binding UI elements to data sources, or managing multi-threading. It is used to query the UI hierarchy and find elements.
